description:
Bluesky, which runs on open source software and is based on an open protocol for social platforms, has lately seen it's user base take a 10-fold increase as Brazil shutters TwitterX.

The post Bluesky Appears to Be the Winner in the Fight Between Musk and Brazil appeared first on FOSS Force.
title: Bluesky Appears to Be the Winner in the Fight Between Musk and Brazil
